Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: VCM administration to control rats significantly increased renal malondialdehyde ( MDA ) and urinary N - acetyl - beta - d - glucosaminidase ( NAG , a marker of renal tubular injury ) excretion but decreased superoxide dismutase ( SOD ) and catalase ( CAT ) activities .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| renal injury |

The paragraph mentions "renal malondialdehyde (MDA) and urinary N - acetyl - beta - d - glucosaminidase (NAG)" as indicators of renal injury. Therefore, the disease entity is "renal injury".

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| renal injury |

The paragraph mentions "renal injury" as indicated by increased excretion of "renal malondialdehyde (MDA)" and "urinary N - acetyl - beta - d - glucosaminidase (NAG)". Therefore, the disease entity is "renal injury". Other mentioned entities such as "VCM administration", "renal tubular injury", "superoxide dismutase (SOD)", and "catalase (CAT)" do not clearly refer to diseases.
